The total number of crimes on and around Barnard’s campus has increased since 2021

Total: 9

Aggravated assault: 1

Robbery: 2

Total: 7

Rape: 2

Motor vehicle theft: 3

Motor vehicle theft: 3

Robbery: 2

Fondling: 1

Burglary: 3

Total: 2

Fondling: 1

Burglary: 2

Burglary: 1

2021

2022

2023

Notes: Due to campus access restrictions during the COVID-19 pandemic, most students were not on campus during spring 2021.

Source: Annual Security and Fire Safety Report
